name: Dr. Pill (itch)
description:
• You must stop the infection!
  • Use the pills to destoy viruses.
  • Combining 4 or more pills/virus of the same color these will be destroyed.
  • Collet pills of the same color (maximun 6) of the top of the board and launch them again to match the colors and remove the viruses.
  • Remember that you can only pick up and throw pills, viruses are strongly attached!
  • Play doubles with a friend for more fun.
